task.summary: Default task

:package: Add Paket dependency manager
Paket was added as a tool for managing NuGet and Git dependencies.
:wrench: Configure Paket
The .config/dotnet-tools.json file was added to configure Paket and its commands.
:crystal_ball: Initialize dependency restore
A restore.cmd file was added to automate restoring dependencies on build. This lays the foundation for dependency management.
:construction: Set up infrastructure
This commit focused on setting up the basic tools, files and processes needed to manage dependencies in a reproducible way.
:electric_plug: Power on dependency restoring
The restore script was implemented to restore dependencies for Workload, Tools and the main project in one go.
:recycle: Apply DRY principles
Redundant restore commands were avoided by leveraging shared initialization logic in the restore script.
:wrench: Tighten dependency screws
Final checks made to ensure the dependency restoring process is robust and hermetic.
:tada: Dependencies on demand
Dependencies can now be restored automatically via the consistent process established in this commit.

:heavy_plus_sign: Add install-maui.ps1 script
- Added the install-maui.ps1 script to the project.
The commit includes the addition of the install-maui.ps1 script to the project. This script is used for installing the Maui framework.
:file_folder: Files modified: - .idea/.idea.OOP_Labs/.idea/indexLayout.xml
Moved `.config` folder from `Lab_2/Inheritence` to the root of the repository.

:books: Add database connectivity lab project
The Lab 9 project for connecting code to a database was added to the solution.

:book: Add documentation comments
XML documentation comments were added throughout to document classes, methods and parameters.
:lipstick: Refine error handling
Error messages and numbers were made more clear and consistent for different connection errors.
:recycle: Apply DRY principles
Repeated connection handling logic was consolidated to avoid duplication.
:checkered_flag: Finish database CRUD
Methods for all basic CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) are now implemented.
:construction: Lay database foundation
Established the core class and methods for connecting to and interacting with the database.
:electric_plug: Power database interactions
Core functionality is in place to execute queries and access data programmatically.
:pencil: Polish documentation
Doc comments were filled out further to exemplify intended usage of the class.
:lock: Secure database access
Credentials and connection strings are now kept securely within the class.
:tada: Database connectivity enabled
The class provides a reversible interface for basic data operations on the database.

:wrench: Refactor DBConnect.cs in Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database
- Improved code readability and added XML documentation comments to Count() and Backup() methods. - Refactored variable names for clarity and consistency. - Updated the backup file path to use the user's directory. - Added error handling for IOException in Backup() and Restore() methods. - Changed the file reading and writing methods to use Path.Join and Path.Combine for platform-independent path concatenation. - Added nullability checks and assertions for process and file objects.
The commit includes refactoring of DBConnect.cs in the Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database project. Changes have been made to improve code readability, enhance error handling, and ensure platform independence.
:file_folder: Files modified: - Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/DBConnect.cs

:electric_plug: Power MySQL CLI from C#
Code added to launch mysql CLI from C# and pipe SQL queries to standard input.
:construction: Lay foundation for SQL execution
Initial work setting up the basic plumbing to feed SQL to mysql from the application.
:wrench: Tweak CLI process handling
Minor refinements to helper method for robustly starting, controlling and closing the CLI process.
:book: Add documentation
Doc comments provide insight into approach and intended usage of the CLI execution helper.
:recycle: Apply DRY principles
Avoided duplicating code by consolidating common CLI process handling logic.
:checkered_flag: Cross integration finish line
SQL can now be seamlessly executed from C# code via launching and interacting with mysql CLI.
:electric_plug: Energize automation
Establishes reusable process for automated SQL execution outside of a database connection.
:construction: Lay automation groundwork
Foundation work opens doors to more advanced integration like running migrations or seed data.
:tada: SQL empowered applications
Applications can now dynamically generate and run SQL statements without database dependencies.
Reformatted Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Program.cs

:wrench: Refactor
This commit refactors the database connection code to use more modern async/await syntax.
Deleted .idea/.idea.OOP_Labs/.idea/tab-highlighter.xml

:pencil2: Documentation
This commit adds XML documentation comments to the Form1 and Program classes to document their purpose and methods.
Reformatted Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Form1.Designer.cs

:recycle: Refactor Form1.cs and Form1.resx in Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database
- Commented out unused namespaces in Form1.cs. - Removed unnecessary content from Form1.resx. - Updated project file (Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.csproj) with additional properties.
The commit includes refactoring of Form1.cs and Form1.resx in the Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database project. Changes have been made to remove unused code and update project configuration.
:file_folder: Files modified: - Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Form1.cs - Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Form1.resx - Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.csproj

:rocket: Enhancement
This commit adds a run configuration file to simplify running the database application from within the IDE.

:pencil: Refactor database backup/restore code
This commit refactors the database backup and restore code:
- Standardizes argument formatting for mysql/mysqldump commands - Adds comments to explain restore file location - Changes "home directory" to more accurate "home drive"
The changes aim to improve readability and accuracy of the database backup/restore functionality.

:pencil: Format RESX metadata
This commit refactors the Form1.resx file to:
Add newlines for readability Standardize spacing in metadata attributes
No functional changes were made, this is purely a formatting pass to improve code readability.
The refactoring produces a cleaner, more consistent file structure without altering its functionality or purpose.

🔨 Add XML comment block
This commit adds a multi-line XML comment at the top of the Form1.resx file to document:
- The ResX schema format - Data types and serialization - Mimetypes
No code was changed, only documentation was added.
The comment block provides context for others working with this file in the future.
Changed Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database to use .NET framework instead of .NET core.

🔨 Add IntelliJ IDEA project files
This commit adds several IntelliJ IDEA project files to enable project features:
- GitLink.xml - Link IDE to Git repo - csv-editor.xml - Configure CSV file attributes - dataSources.xml - Add local MySQL data source
No code was changed, only metadata files were added.
These project configuration files enable version control and data source integration in the IDE.

:arrow_up: Update Project Configuration
This commit updates the project configuration for a .NET Framework console application project. The runtime was changed from CoreCLR to .NET Framework and the target framework was updated. The project file was also updated to setNullable to warnings.

:hammer_and_wrench: Update Lab 9 code and project files
This commit includes the following changes to the Lab 9 code and project files:
- In the `.run/Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.run.xml` file: - Updated the `RUNTIME_TYPE` option from `netfw` to `coreclr`.
- In the `Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Form1.Designer.cs` file: - Modified the initialization code for buttons (`bInsert`, `bUpdate`, `bSelect`, `bDelete`, `bCount`, `bBackup`, `bRestore`) and the `dgDisplay` DataGridView. - Adjusted the button locations and sizes. - Added column definitions (`ciD`, `cName`, `cAge`) for the DataGridView.
- In the `Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.csproj` file: - Changed the `Nullable` property value from `warnings` to `disable`. - Set the `Prefer32bit` property to `false`. - Added documentation file paths for both Debug and Release configurations. - Added the following files to the project: - `bin\Debug\Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.xml` - `bin\Release\Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.xml` - `paket.lock` - `paket.references`
:file_folder: Files modified: - .run/Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.run.xml - Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Form1.Designer.cs - Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.csproj

:recycle: Update Form1 Resource File
This commit updates the Form1 resource (resx) file to reflect the project now targeting .NET Framework 4.8 instead of 2.0. The xml schema and reader/writer versions were updated.

**Title**: :bug: Fix button locations and add event handlers
**Body**: The commit fixes the button locations and adds event handlers for button clicks in the `Form1.Designer.cs` and `Form1.cs` files.
In `Form1.Designer.cs`: - The `using System.Drawing;` namespace is added. - The location and size of the buttons (`bInsert`, `bUpdate`, `bSelect`, `bDelete`, `bCount`, `bBackup`, `bRestore`) are updated. - The `Text` and `UseVisualStyleBackColor` properties are set for each button. - Event handlers are added for button clicks.
In `Form1.cs`: - Unnecessary using statements are removed.
These changes ensure that the buttons are correctly positioned and functional within the form.

:recycle: Update Runtime Type
This commit updates the runtime type in the .run configuration file from "coreclr" to "netfw" when running the Lab 9 project.
Remove BOM from `Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/App.config`

:recycle: Refactor DB Connect Code
This commit refactors the DBConnect class to: - Add XML documentation to methods - Initialize connection string constant - Encapsulate error handling in array - Improve naming of variables - Add whitespace for readability
It also refactors Form1 designer to: - Make components public - Assign variables for readability

:recycle: Refactor Form1 Code
This commit refactors the Form1 class to:
- Create DBConnect instance in constructor - Add XML docs to button click methods - Explicitly type parameter variables - Box count value before adding to datagrid - Add whitespace for readability
Reformatted Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database/DBConnect.cs

:recycle: Update Local MySQL Data Source
This commit updates the local MySQL data source configuration in IntelliJ:
- Generates a new UUID - Sets the default port to 3306
This ensures the data source is configured correctly to connect to a local MySQL instance on the standard port.

:recycle: Improve Database Restore Method
This commit improves the database restore method:
- Gets USERPROFILE instead of HOMEDRIVE for platform independence - Adds XML documentation - Improves variable names for clarity

:axe: Removed `Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database` from the repository.
:package: Stored the rest of the `Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database` files in a 7z archive.
:file_folder: Stored a backup of the SQL dump from MySQL in the `Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.7z` archive file
:wastebasket: Deleted `.run/Lab_9_Connecting_Code_to_a_Database.run.xml` and `.idea/.idea.OOP_Labs/.idea/dataSources.xml`.
:wastebasket: Deleted `old` directory
